channel.title: Template on Nerd things and more...
channel.description: Recent content in Template on Nerd things and more...

item.title: Read the org
item.description:
Recently I wrote about using org-reveal to make presentations with emacs and org-mode, but org-mode actually can export the org document to an html file by using SPC m e h o it will open the generated html.

The results is pretty simple html file, but you can customize it by adding a custom setup file.

One of my favorites is the read the docs theme. It is pretty elegant and lean, in my opinion.
